# carbonFootprintR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/carbonFootprintR)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=carbonFootprintR)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of carbonFootprintR is to calculate the carbon footprint of an event. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DataStrategist/carbonFootprintR")
```

This repo is a work in progress, but check the vignette!
